== Chavassery (627251) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Chavassery is a village in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 2311 hectares and harbouring 4380 households with total population of 22480 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Mattannur]] is at a distance of 7 km. Male population is 10902 and female population is 11578. Scheduled Caste Population is 347 and Scheduled Tribes population is 502. Census Location Code of the village is 627251<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 18257 (81.21%)
* Literate male population: 9144 (83.87%)
* Literate female population: 9113 (78.71%)
